title: KUFOS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Driver/ Office Attendant Posts
description: The Kerala University of Fisheries and Ocean Studies (KUFOS) has declared the official notification for the posts of Driver/ Office attendant Vacancies for those candidates who are qualified with a 10th Pass. Interested candidates should fill out the application and send it along with the relevant documents to the address below on or before the last date of the application. Here we mentioned everything about the Age Limit, Selection Process, Salary Structure, Education details, Application fe...
